Title: Relates to enacting the free resources for equitable education (FREE) act
Summary: Relates to enacting the "free resources for equitable education (FREE) act"; requires State University of New York higher education institutions to designate all general education and 25 percent of all major specific courses as low textbook cost (LTC) or zero textbook cost (ZTC).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "free resources for equitable education (FREE) act"
